data.caption: Clarification Regarding The News Article
data.news_body: Clarification regarding the news article dated October 13 2025 on Moneycontrol titled Jupiter Life Line in Rs 1400-crore expansion push in Maharashtra to double capacity by 2029

data.caption: Clarification sought from Jupiter Life Line Hospitals Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Jupiter Life Line Hospitals Ltd on October 13 2025 with reference to news appeared in https://www.moneycontrol.com dated October 13 2025 quoting "Jupiter Life Line in Rs 1400-crore expansion push in Maharashtra to double capacity by 2029."

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 -Purchase Of Land At Ghodbundar Mira Road District Thane.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we would like to inform you that the Company has purchased land at Ghodbundar Mira Road District Thane with an area of ~8433 Sq. Meter. The land is acquired for setting up a hospital.
